tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was referred to Dr. Padma by one of my friends who had conceived a baby through IVF in first attempt.

Dr. Padma takes special interest in her patients and deals with them accordingly . I had high sugar levels and was advised that I do not plan for pregnancy until they were normal. So Dr. Padma referred me to endocrinologist and kept in touch with her regularly. 

Once my sugar levels were normal, I got all my tests done and started with IUI procedure and I conceived in first IUI. Then later I was referred to good Gynaecologist who delivered my baby safe and healthy. We cannot thank doctor Padma enough for taking special care throughout our journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We were very worried about our pregnancy plans but doctor treated us very friendly and gave us positive result.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Padma Mam is very good and comes with a lot of experience in the field of treating infertility , she is very friendly with patients and explains every thing clearly, highly recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are thankful to Dr. Padma mam. During our difficult phase of life we have met lot of IVF clinics but padma mam is exceptionally different ** ***** *** ** *** **** ***** *** ** ***** During first consultation with mam, we were afraid and have lot of questions in mind she politely listened with patience and examine reports of past history. She is extremely polite, soft-spoken and treats her patients like her own child.Mam always keep an eye on each and everything and guide accordingly. Mam has such a pleasant smile and soft spoken nature that once u meet her u will start feeling positive and complications will go on its own. At clinic everything is systematic and well managed. Mam will never hurry you u can ask as many questions u have in ur mind. U can only leave once u r completely satisfied and want to go out on ur own. We are extremely satisfied and happy with kind of treatment and care we got from everyone at Oasis We highly recommend Dr. Padma for IVF. Thank you so much for everything Mam ...!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),
review:
I came to India from Australia for IVF treatment and heard about Dr Padmavathi who I'd specialist in IVF Success rate.

She explained everything so well and helped me to proceed with my treatment in short span of time due to my short stay in india.

I have stored my embryos as part of my treatment and waiting for embryos transfer.

While I Was waiting I have been advised to take few medication to support my body Nd it helped me to conceive naturally.

Thanks to Dr Padmavathi madam for helping me to make my dream come true and Nd my pregnancy journey went really smooth without any complications and I gave birth to a beautiful princess in December 2023.

Even though I came for IVF I ended up conceive naturally with the help of good medication Nd guidance from Dr Padmavathi.

Once again thanks to Dr Padmavathi and OYASIS team for the care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The treatment we got is very satisfying, the counselling was very well understandable, the sisters and all the staffs we very co operative. Dr Padmavathi does very good treatment and diagnosis. Am pregnant from her treatment, The years of sorrow turns out to be a Joy. God bless Dr.Padmavathi and ART FERTILITY CLINICS

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Firstly I would like to thank Docter Padmavathi as the treatment was successful and I am pregnant now. We exactly followed what she prescribed or advised from the beginning of the treatment. She was very friendly and used to answer all our long list of questions/doubts/fears with a smile . I feel lucky to find her during this journey. I would definitely recommend her for anyone who is in this journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Padma madam is most supportive and friendly doctor that we have ever met .  Her experience  and  her emotional support helped me in conceiving and her encouragement for being optimistic has helped me in going for a smoother delivery. We are enjoying our parenthood now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: It was one of the best decision to meet Dr Padma. Her diagnostic skills and ability to understand the issue and give right treatment is commendable. She always checks on her patients and keep track of their progress. Dr Padma listens patiently and gives proper conceling to Patients undergoing issues in conception. Thank you so much for everything we are now eagerly waiting to have a healthy baby.

When we met Dr Padma for the first time, we could feel a world of difference compared to the experiences we had with other consultants. And the difference was that she listened to us. She understood us and communicated to us in a way that we felt assured. 

All throughout, It would be an understatement to say that she took extra steps to make us feel supported. In fact, she always went miles beyond the call of her duty. We felt comfortable, positive and more hopeful. She was always just a phone call away. Pulled us up during the lows and kept us grounded during the highs. 

The treatment and thereafter, it is a journey. A very important journey for expectant parents. She was there in every step of that journey with us. 

As we celebrate our son's first birthday this week, we are ever thankful and indebted for the amazing part she played in the most important phase of our lives.

We came to see Dr Padma at Oasis, as we have had failed IVF in England and wanted to have better chance with our next cycle. Dr Padma is extremely knowledgeable, friendly and very approachable. She understood our situation very well and our treatment is going good so far.  We have full confidence in Dr Padma, based on our previous experiences. We are very happy with our decision to come to Dr Padma for our treatment. The clinic and staff are also very good. I recommend this doctor and the clinic.

review:
We are thankful to Dr. Padma mam. During our difficult phase of life we have met lot of IVF clinics but padma mam is exceptionally different no doubt she is the best among all of them.

During first consultation with mam, we were afraid and have lot of questions in mind she politely listened with patience and examine reports of past history. She is extremely polite, soft-spoken and treats her patients like her own child.Mam always keep an eye on each and everything and guide accordingly.

Mam has such a pleasant smile and soft spoken nature that once u meet her u will start feeling positive and complications will go on its own. At clinic everything is systematic and well managed. Mam will never hurry you u can ask as many questions u have in ur mind. U can only leave once u r completely satisfied and want to go out on ur own.

We are extremely satisfied and happy with kind of treatment and care we got from everyone at Oasis We highly recommend Dr. Padma for IVF. Thank you so much for everything.

Thank you doctor for all the help and support
